100 shots is in fact against the rules, yes.

::Killfest::

Killfest runs up near DrillBit. He takes aim with his EMP rifle, 
firing four shots head on at Bullet.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 100 shots? a little bit of overkill isn't it?
> 
> The gattling gun shots hit all around Bullet. The enraged bull 
figured these
> were warning shots since nobody could be that bad a shot. He slammed 
on the
> breaks stopping immediately.
> 
> Blaze finally caught up to where Drillbit was at, She had to warn 
the other
> bot that Bullet stopping wasn't a good thing. "You might want to 
start
> running."She suggested,  "Bullet isn't going to stop just because 
you say
> so."
> 
> The bull turned around this time looking at Drillbit and Blaze, he 
lowered
> his head, stomped a few times, snorted and began another charge. In 
his
> enraged state he didn't feel pain but he'd have problems when the 
adrenaline
> wore off.
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
